articles.description: JioMart has scaled rapidly within a few months of launch. At Facebook Fuel for India 2020, Reliance Industries outlined its growth plans for the platform.
articles.content:
JioMart, Reliance's online-to-offline commerce platform that launched in May, has scaled up rapidly, riding on the pandemic-fuelled digital acceleration.
